name: GalleryImagesOptions
shortdesc: Deprecated for Adobe Photoshop CS3, the make photo gallery method has moved to Bridge.

property.name: resizeConstraint
property.shortdesc: How should the image be constrained.

property.name: imageQuality
property.shortdesc: The quality setting for the JPEG image.

property.name: border
property.shortdesc: The amount of border pixels you want between your images.

property.name: includeFilename
property.shortdesc: Include the file name in the text for the gallery images.

property.name: caption
property.shortdesc: Generate a caption for the images.

property.name: includeCredits
property.shortdesc: Include the credits in the text for the gallery images.

property.name: includeTitle
property.shortdesc: Include the title in the text for the gallery images.

property.name: includeCopyright
property.shortdesc: Include the copyright in the text for the gallery images.

property.name: font
property.shortdesc: Font for the gallery images text.

property.name: fontSize
property.shortdesc: Font size for the gallery images text.
